Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI feedback is more general and not always helpful, whereas teacher feedback in law is always more technical and specific so more effective.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback can be more frustrating and less trustworthy because it is not coming from someone with a law degree and with legal experience.
